title: Ep 162: Secrets of a Braider with @mshairandhumor
itunes:title: Ep 162: Secrets of a Braider with @mshairandhumor
itunes:subtitle: Braider and hair stylist Kamilah, aka @mshairandhumor, pops by to talk all things braids, from techniques and maintenance to who can wear them (and who can't). Before that: We talk about skincare for menopause as well as our favorite perf...
description:
Braider and hair stylist Kamilah, aka @mshairandhumor, pops by to talk all things braids, from techniques and maintenance to who can wear them (and who can't). Before that: We talk about skincare for menopause as well as our favorite perfumes for summer.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.
